roleset_name: follow a procedure; be in line with expectations or other facts

roles.descr: regulations, procedure, or expectations accorded with
roles.descr_trans: 符合的法规、程序或期望

roleset_name_trans: 遵循程序；符合预期或其他事实

roleset_name: create or agree to a pact

roles.descr: first party in agreement, both parties when mentioned together
roles.descr_trans: 达成协议的第一方，当同时提及时双方

roles.descr: subject of promise, subject/topic pact involves
roles.descr_trans: 承诺的主题、主题/主题契约涉及
